meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ben Sternberg Ellen Green Nathan Chan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4074.

td.p: Ben Sternberg, an investment banker from San Francisco, California
Ellen Green, a freelance tutor from San Diego, California
Nathan Chan, a software tester from Bellevue, Washington (whose 2-day cash winnings total $17,400)

tr.td: FUN WITH "FUN"
MADE IN TAIWAN
NETWORKING
GOOD EATS
IT'S A BOY!
IT'S A GIRL!

One of the 2 birds honored with a star on Hollywood's Walk of Fame
Nathan
Ellen
Ben
2nd place: trip to the Grenadines & stay at Palm Island
3rd place: trip to San Francisco by Yahoo! Travel
New champion: $21,200
Nathan
Ellen
Ben

12 R,
4 W
(including 2 DDs)

24 R,
4 W
(including 1 DD)
